skill.s1.name: Owl Fire
skill.s1.description: Deal [color=#ff3b1d][b]Fire damage[/b][/color] to 1 foe equal to [color=#ff3b1d][b]{skill_data}[/b][/color] of [color=#ff3b1d][b]Attack[/b][/color], inflict [color=#ff3b1d][b][i]Burn[/i][/b][/color] for 2 turns, and decrease [color=#ff3b1d][b]healing received[/b][/color] by [color=#ff3b1d][b]30%[/b][/color].
skill.s2.name: Owl Green
skill.s2.description: Restore 1 ally's [color=#ff3b1d][b]HP[/b][/color] by [color=#ff3b1d][b]{skill_data}[/b][/color] of [color=#ff3b1d][b]Lufel's Attack[/b][/color] + [color=#ff3b1d][b]{skill_data}[/b][/color]. If target's [color=#ff3b1d][b]HP[/b][/color] is below [color=#ff3b1d][b]50%[/b][/color], increase [color=#ff3b1d][b]healing effect[/b][/color] by [color=#ff3b1d][b]{skill_data}[/b][/color].
skill.s3.name: Healing Satellite
skill.s3.description: Restore party's [color=#ff3b1d][b]HP[/b][/color] by [color=#ff3b1d][b]{skill_data}[/b][/color] of [color=#ff3b1d][b]Lufel's Attack[/b][/color] + [color=#ff3b1d][b]{skill_data}[/b][/color]. Increase [color=#ff3b1d][b]healing effect[/b][/color] on the main target by [color=#ff3b1d][b]{skill_data}[/b][/color].
skill.hl.name: Highlight
skill.hl.description: Restore party's [color=#ff3b1d][b]HP[/b][/color] by [color=#ff3b1d][b]{skill_data}[/b][/color] of [color=#ff3b1d][b]Lufel's Attack[/b][/color] + [color=#ff3b1d][b]{skill_data}[/b][/color]. Increase party's [color=#ff3b1d][b]Attack[/b][/color] by [color=#ff3b1d][b]{skill_data}[/b][/color] for 1 turn.
skill.p1.name: Forest Sage
skill.p1.description: After attacking with a skill, grant [color=#f35a5d][b]Starfire[/b][/color] to up to [color=#ff3b1d][b]{skill_data}[/b][/color] allies.
skill.p2.name: Sparks of Support
skill.p2.description: Increase [color=#ff3b1d][b]healing effect[/b][/color] based on [color=#ff3b1d][b]Lufel's max HP[/b][/color]. The effect is maximized at [color=#ff3b1d][b]{skill_data} HP[/b][/color], and [color=#ff3b1d][b]healing effect[/b][/color] will increase by [color=#ff3b1d][b]{skill_data}[/b][/color].
awareness.a0.name: Redheaded Hero
awareness.a0.description: When using healing skills, grant [color=#f35a5d][b]Starfire I[/b][/color] to the main target for 1 turn
After [color=#f35a5d][b]Starfire I[/b][/color]  ends, grant [color=#f35a5d][b]Starfire II[/b][/color] for 1 turn.

[color=#f35a5d][b]Starfire I[/b][/color]: Increase [color=#ff3b1d][b]Attack[/b][/color] by [color=#ff3b1d][b]4%[/b][/color] of [color=#ff3b1d][b]Lufel's Attack[/b][/color] (up to [color=#ff3b1d][b]160[/b][/color]).

[color=#f35a5d][b]Starfire II[/b][/color]: Increase [color=#ff3b1d][b]Attack[/b][/color] by [color=#ff3b1d][b]8%[/b][/color] of [color=#ff3b1d][b]Lufel's Attack[/b][/color] (up to [color=#ff3b1d][b]320[/b][/color]).
[b][color=#f35a5d][b]Starfire[/b][/color] does not stack, and only 1 stack is granted.[/b]
awareness.a1.name: Owl Eyes
awareness.a1.description: At the start of battle, inflict [color=#ff3b1d][b][i]Burn[/i][/b][/color] on the foe with the highest remaining [color=#ff3b1d][b]HP[/b][/color].
Also, increase allies' [color=#ff3b1d][b]elemental ailment accuracy[/b][/color] by [color=#ff3b1d][b]33%[/b][/color] when they have [color=#f35a5d][b]Starfire[/b][/color].
awareness.a2.name: Soaring Bird of Prey
awareness.a2.description: Increase the skill levels of [ref=s1][color=#71e2fd][b][u]Owl Fire[/u][/b][/color][/ref] and [ref=s2][color=#71e2fd][b][u]Owl Green[/u][/b][/color][/ref] by [color=#ff3b1d][b]2[/b][/color].
awareness.a3.name: Nocturnal
awareness.a3.description: When healing an ally who has [color=#f35a5d][b]Starfire II[/b][/color], increase [color=#f35a5d][b]healing effect[/b][/color] by [color=#ff3b1d][b]10%[/b][/color].
awareness.a4.name: Preening
awareness.a4.description: Increase the skill levels of [ref=s3][color=#71e2fd][b][u]Healing Satellite[/u][/b][/color][/ref] and [ref=hl][color=#71e2fd][b][u]Thief Tactics[/u][/b][/color][/ref] by [color=#ff3b1d][b]2[/b][/color].
awareness.a5.name: Sheltering Wings of Light
awareness.a5.description: [b][ref=hl][color=#71e2fd][b][u]Highlight[/u][/b][/color][/ref] Enhanced[/b]: Increase party's [color=#f35a5d][b]Fire damage[/b][/color] by [color=#ff3b1d][b]32%[/b][/color] for [color=#ff3b1d][b]1[/b][/color] turn.
awareness.a6.name: Midnight Bonfire
awareness.a6.description: After [color=#f35a5d][b]Starfire II[/b][/color] ends, gain [color=#f35a5d][b]Starfire III[/b][/color] for 1 turn

[color=#f35a5d][b]Starfire III[/b][/color]: Increase [color=#ff3b1d][b]Attack[/b][/color] by [color=#ff3b1d][b]8%[/b][/color] of [color=#ff3b1d][b]Lufel's Attack[/b][/color], increase [color=#ff3b1d][b]Fire damage[/b][/color] by [color=#ff3b1d][b]20%[/b][/color], and increase [color=#ff3b1d][b]healing received[/b][/color] by [color=#ff3b1d][b]10%[/b][/color].
